QuestData.Title: Dropping In
QuestData.Description: Witch Lord Morkurk, the leader of the fortress, has catapults set up along the road into their compound.$B$BThat won't be a problem for us.$B$BTake out the ogres around the catapults and mark them for me. This vortex spell I have prepared will handle the rest.$B$BWe'll meet at the gate to the fortress once the catapults are gone.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Magister Serena destroy $1oa Gordunni Boulderthrowers.
